input: sentence 1: Every day after dinner Mr. Schmidt took a long nap. Mark would let him sleep for an hour, then wake him up, scold him, and get him to work. He needed to get him to finish his work, because his work was beautiful. [SEP] sentence 2: Mr. Schmidt's work was beautiful.
